text: Well of Corruption
Poison the wells, let the darkness fill their veins and the land!
The reach of Harakhte is not to be underestimated, the influence of darkness grows.

Harakhte has agents everywhere, they entice those who desire wealth and power. Tricking them into taking part in Dark Rituals with terrible consequences...
Caravan Masters make excellent thralls, especially when their cargo ends up misplaced.
Hungry Ghouls roam outside the settlement making patrol nigh in possible.
A army of zombies will be summoned near this settlement
A frenzied mob of zombies disciples. This force will dissipate over time unless it is in areas of high Vampiric corruption.
Zombie Army
